Cookie Policy

Last Updated: December 2024

What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help websites remember your preferences and improve functionality.

Cookies We Use

  • Essential: Required for site functionality (no consent needed)
  • Analytics: Help us understand usage via Google Analytics 4 (opt-in)
  • Preferences: Remember your calculator settings (optional)

Google Analytics 4

We use GA4 with Consent Mode to understand how visitors use our site. This helps us:

  • Improve calculator functionality
  • Create better content
  • Generate qualified leads
  • Understand user behavior patterns

Managing Cookies

You can control cookies through your browser settings:

  • Chrome: Settings → Privacy and Security → Cookies
  • Firefox: Settings → Privacy & Security → Cookies
  • Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Cookies
  • Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions

Impact of Disabling Cookies

Disabling cookies may affect:

  • Calculator functionality and preference saving
  • Site performance optimization
  • Our ability to improve tools and content
  • Lead generation effectiveness
